title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**About us @Symphony**
 We’ve spent the last 10 years building the financial markets largest, most trusted communication network. Over 500 market participants across the buy-side, sell-side, securities servicing, and beyond. Over half a million users from trading desks to operations and custody teams interacting securely and in real-time on Symphony.
   

  

**But that was only chapter one.** 
 We’re now using our technology foundation to accelerate far beyond secure collaboration to become the standard connective layer that enables more efficient and automated workflows across the industry to bring the future to financial markets.
   

  

**The opportunity and our ambition are huge** 
 . But we need passionate, dedicated individuals to get there. At Symphony we work hard and fast. Our unique blend of technology and financial services makes it an environment you won't get elsewhere.
   

  

**Role Description**
 We are seeking a skilled S
 **enior** 
**Full-stack Software Engineer (Java/TypeScript)** 
 to join one of our development teams in a team lead capacity. In this role, you’ll be designing, developing, and maintaining server-side services and their frontend counterparts. You will serve as the tech lead and mentor for junior developers and contractors and have full ownership of one of our products. You will collaborate closely with software engineers, product managers, and other stakeholders to deliver robust and scalable solutions.
   

  

 The Market Voice and Video team has built the core of Audio and Video communication in the Symphony app using WebRTC. We are a small team of developers that works with Java and media backend services as well as Angular frontend. The team is passionate about CI/CD best practices. We’re looking for top-notch talent to join our team to help us change the way the world communicates.
   

  

 We are seeking someone who asks questions, shares own ideas as well as learns from others, proactively communicates, and can be accountable for own deliverables.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 You will be a contributor in our backend development team with following responsibilities:
   

  

* Design, implement and test scalable server-side endpoints (Java, Spring Boot) and their interaction with the Symphony ecosystem
* Frontend development using Angular
* Contribute to Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) solutions with Jenkins at the center
* Collaborate with the product team to gather requirements and other engineering teams to perform product integration
* Investigate issues or performance bottlenecks, document failure analysis, post-mortem, and root cause analysis when required
* Participate constructively and collaboratively in design and code reviews


**Qualifications**
* BS in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field and 7+ years’ of practical experience in software development
* Strong proficiency in Java, with a good understanding of its ecosystems and Spring Framework (Spring Boot)
* Strong proficiency in Angular and Typescript.
* Experience working with tools, such as Docker, K8s, Terraform, Git, Jenkins
* Experienced working in GCP and/or AWS cloud environments


**Compensation**
* Salary range: 700,000–7500,000 SEK per year depending on experience and qualifications
* Bonus Plan: 19% bonus target
* Benefits and Perks vary based on location.


**Benefits And Perks**
* Regional specific competitive benefits
* Build your own Benefits (BYOB) perk
* Many other fun and exciting benefits and activities!


 We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment.

title: Business Intelligence Developer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches as well as Swedish style snus online. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 250 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 At Haypp Group, data is our DNA. Within Haypp Lab, our insights department, we’re a diverse, talented group of 13 people who are driven by a shared mission and a positive, can-do attitude. We’re not just about numbers—we’re about creating real insights that drive business and bring value to our customers. Our team works closely with manufacturers, researchers, universities, and even governmental institutions to help move the industry forward and give consumers smarter, healthier choices.
   

  

 We don’t settle for "just okay." We're pushing the limits of what our data platform can do, and we need a rockstar BI Developer to join our team, step up our game, and partner with us to deliver top-tier business insights. If you’re someone who thrives on making a big impact and working collaboratively, we want you to join us in this exciting journey. Bonus points if you’re an expert in Qlik Sense!
   

  

**Here’s how you'll go the extra mile in your role:**
* Understanding and Translating Client Needs: You’ll work hand-in-hand with external clients to understand their needs and transform them into sharp, actionable visualizations that make a difference. You’re not just delivering data—you’re delivering insight that matters.
* Building Data Models: You’ll craft Qlik Sense user experiences that are intuitive, simple, and impactful, always keeping the business goals at the forefront.
* Ad-hoc Analysis for Clients: You’ll jump in when the business needs it, running quick but meaningful analyses that directly support urgent client requests.
* Data Quality & Validation: You'll make sure that every report we create is not just accurate but trustworthy and actionable for our clients.
* Data Governance: Working closely with our Data Engineers and Data Scientists, you'll ensure that our data is aligned with company best practices, secure, and structured in a way that makes extracting insights easy.
* Tool Administration: You’ll manage access for both internal and external users, ensuring that the right people have the right tools to get things done.
* User Training and Support for Clients: You'll lead training sessions, teaching our clients how to make the most of our dashboards and ensuring they feel confident using our insights to drive decisions.


**What We Want From You**
 For us, it's not just about technical skills—it’s about finding the right teammate who shares our values and can collaborate with others in a positive, open, and supportive environment. We want someone who can roll up their sleeves, take on challenges, and do whatever it takes to help the team succeed.
   

  

**Basic qualifications to succeed in the role:**
* Solid experience with BI tools any of: Qlik Sense, Tableau, Power BI (Qlik Sense experience is a big plus).
* Experience with report automation (NPrinting experience is a bonus).
* An understanding of SQL for querying and fetching data.
* A knack for working closely with the business to translate data into powerful visualizations.
* A structured approach to work—ensuring KPIs and metrics are clearly defined and documented.
* Strong communication and presentation skills—able to break down complex data into clear, business-friendly insights.
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken.
* Minimum 3 years experience


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *No Douchebags* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Max Moen at max.moen@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 The Haypp Group is spearheading the global transformation from smoking to healthier product alternatives. With origins in Scandinavia our extensive experience from pioneering markets in smoke free alternatives, as well as being a leader in the e-commerce sector, we now fully bring our vision to a global scale.
   

  

 With ten e-commerce brands, the Haypp Group is present in seven countries where we serve more than 950 000 consumers.

title: AI Developer – Stockholm
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Design Services
description:
Vi har nyligen startat en systemutvecklingsenhet i Sverige med ett starkt fokus på data och AI, där vi önskar växa med ett gäng framåtlutade AI Developers.
   

  

**AI Developer – Bygg AI-lösningar som skapar värde!**
 Hos oss kommer du ta en ledande roll i vår resa att skapa framtidens tekniska lösningar där möjliggörande av data och införandet av AI kommer spela en central roll.
   

  

 Så här säger Rebecca Hammel, Head of Software Development, om visionen för enheten:
   

  

*”Jag är oerhört entusiastisk över att få leda detta nya team och bidra till Solitas fortsatta tillväxt. Vi skapar en miljö där Software Designers, Data Engineers, Data Scientists och slutanvändare arbetar nära tillsammans för att snabbt leverera affärsvärde med hjälp av den senaste tekniken inom Cloud och AI”.*
 Vad rollen innebär
   

  

 I denna nya roll som AI Developer får du arbeta nära affärs- och teknikteam för att utveckla AI-lösningar som hjälper våra kunder att fatta smartare beslut och automatisera processer på ett intelligent sätt. Du får en unik möjlighet att delta i hela utvecklingscykeln – från idé till produktionssättning – där du inte bara bygger AI-lösningar utan även bidrar med kreativa idéer och strategier för att optimera deras effekt. Vi arbetar agnostiskt när det gäller teknikstackar men förväntar oss att du är bekväm med moderna ramverk och plattformar lämpliga för AI-tjänster. Erfarenhet av att sätta AI-lösningar som RAGs eller Agenter i produktion samt kunskap kring etisk AI är en central del av rollen. Du kommer att ha stor frihet att forma både teknikval och arkitektur för att möta affärsbehov och du kommer arbeta nära Data/AI Engineers/Scientists för att utveckla de bästa AI-lösningarna.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder**
* Meningsfulla projekt: Utveckla AI-lösningar som gör verklig skillnad för våra kunder inom en rad olika branscher.
* Flexibilitet och autonomi för att utforma ditt arbete – läs mer från vår blogg.
* Ständig utveckling: Vi erbjuder kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling för att säkerställa att våra utvecklare ligger längst fram i teknikutvecklingen.
* Innovativ kultur: Arbeta tillsammans med några av de främsta experterna inom AI och data och öppna dörren till nya arbetssätt som CollabAI.
* Bra villkor och sociala aktiviteter! Generösa förmåner som konkurrenskraftig fast lön, pension, 30 semesterdagar och mycket mer samt ett öppet och inkluderande arbetsklimat där vi värnar om både din personliga och professionella utveckling.


**Förmågor och erfarenheter för att lyckas i rollen**
* Bred kunskap gällande AI & maskininlärning i allmänhet och GenAI i synnerhet.
* God förståelse för RAG-arkitektur och/eller AI Agent-arkitektur och erfarenhet av att implementera molnbaserade AI-tjänster för att möjliggöra högkvalitativa AI-lösningar.
* Förmågan att skriva tydlig, enkel och skalbar kod med fokus på kvalitet samt djup kunskap om designmönster, utvecklingsprinciper och moderna AI-ramverk.
* Erfarenhet av att sätta AI-lösningar i produktion med hjälp av DevSecOps och IaC.
* God kunskap kring databaser och datadesign.
* En nyfiken och lösningsorienterad lagspelare som trivs med att arbeta i tvärfunktionella team.


**Intresserad av att höra mer?**
 Låter det som en spännande utmaning? Skicka in din ansökan och bli en del av vårt team som ligger i framkant av AI-utveckling! Om du har några frågor, chatta gärna med Nils på LinkedIn eller skicka ett mail till honom nils.larsen(at)solita.se. Du kan också kontakta rekryteringsansvarig, Sebastian på LinkedIn eller maila sebastian.laine(at)solita.se.
   

  

**Om Solita**
 Vi är ett värderingsstyrt konsultbolag med över 2000 medarbetare i 8 länder, varav 200 i Sverige. Vår storlek gör oss tillräckligt stora för att vara en stabil och innovativ arbetsgivare, men samtidigt tillräckligt små för att värna om våra medarbetare och kunder. Med bred kompetens inom digital transformation erbjuder vi en dynamisk arbetsmiljö. Hos oss får du friheten att utvecklas, både professionellt och personligt.
   

  

**Placeringsort för denna roll är i Stockholm, Sverige**

title: Tech Lead for Production Core unit with great Java skills, Solna
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
*Are you an experienced software Java developer looking to take the next step in your career? Do you want to lead a dynamic team at one of the Nordic region's largest companies? If you have a passion for full-stack development and cloud platforms, this is the job for you!*
**Join us**
 The IT department at PostNord consists of a dedicated team responsible for driving innovation and delivering high-quality software solutions. Our mission is to support the organization's strategic goals by developing scalable and efficient systems. We foster a collaborative and inclusive culture where every team member's contribution is valued.
   

  

**Job Duties**
 As a Tech Lead at PostNord, you will be responsible for guiding our development team and ensuring the successful delivery of software projects. Your role will include:
   

  

* Leading the design, development, and deployment of full-stack applications
* Building and maintaining microservice architecture
* Implementing best practices in software development and ensuring code quality
* Improve and review technical processes to enhance productivity
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
* Mentoring and coaching team members to foster their professional growth
* Driving the adoption of Agile methodologies and DevOps practices
* Ensuring the stability and scalability of our applications in cloud environments (AWS, Azure, or GCP).


 ,
   

  

**Need-to-have**
* Several years of experience in software Java development with a strong emphasis on full-stack development
* High proficiency in Java, Spring Boot or Quarkus
* Good understanding of Angular, Vue, or an equivalent frontend framework
* Experience in building microservices
* Experience with messaging and streaming solutions using ActiveMQ, Kafka, and Kafka Streams
* Experience with Git, Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, Portainer, and CI/CD tools like Bitbucket Pipelines and GitHub Actions
* Experience with relational Database like Oracle or Postgres and non-relational like
* Understanding of container orchestration platforms and experience deploying production software
* Solid understanding of software architecture, design patterns, and best practices
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think critically
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions on schedule
* Experience with Agile methodologies and DevOps practices is a plus
* Fluent in english in speaking and writing


**Nice-to-have**
* Mobile app development
* Fluent in Swedish


**We believe you are a person that is**
* Thorough, analytical, and quick to learn new systems
* Inclusive, structured, and responsible in your working style
* Able to handle stressful situations and prioritize tasks independently
* Communicative and easy to collaborate with, building and nurturing long-term relationships


**We offer you**
**Benefits**
 We offer a variety of work in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at postnord.com
   

  

**Apply**
 We look forward to receive your application!
   

  

 If you have any questions or concerns, please contact manager Carolina Lunde on carolina.lunde@postnord.com. Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: Facklig kontakt | PostNord

title: UX/Frontend lead (Visual Programming for Financial Data)
description:
* Seeking a part-time Quant/Algo Developer to to
 **create statistical and mathematical strategies** 
 and build
 **automated trading systems** 
 on Interactive Brokers and/or Avanza platforms and maintain automated execution systems.



  




* We'll also create a sandbox
 **to help non-professionals can build simple strategies from building blocks of logical operators** 
 , stock filters, time ranges, indicators, parameters and custom formulae and output probabilities.



  




* The long term goal is to create a model that 'recursively learns' from time series and strategies, and builds a perpetually increasing, statistically ranked repo to predict the next move. The longer term goal is that this could be used as
 **'general statistical predictor** 
 ' of
 *any* 
 time series or numerical patterns like matrices where structured data is available such as proprietary databases within molecular diagnostics, private real estate and credit markets.



  




* Send us a line or two at
 **ahmed@batonics.com** 
 telling us if you've done something similar before.



  




* **Selection process** 
 : We'll have small chat with those selected, and if shortlisted we'll send you a challenge on a date you decide but you'll have to return back within a day of submission (it should take a few hours). If we decide o use or publish what you create in that multi-hour challenge we'll pay you 5,000SEK



  




* **Compensation** 
 : Initially
 **an hourly rate based on experience**



  





**Company Description** 




 Batonics offers automation engines tailored for investment analysis and asset management, like scenario modeling, risk management, asset valuation, and automated reporting. With on-premise and cloud-based solutions, Batonics caters to diverse industries through analysis of institutional asset data, with engines adaptable to specialized use cases like Monte Carlo simulations and anomaly detection.

title: Lead C++ Software Engineer
job_function: Engineering, Information Technology, and Supply Chain
description:
WiseTech Global is the market-leading provider of software solutions for the Supply Chain and Logistics industry. Engineer founded, engineer led - we make products for the largest companies in the logistics space globally (like - DHL, FedEx, UPS) and they depend on our software to optimise their processes. This role will sit in our Xware team working on xTrade - our integrations platform used by WiseTech and our customers, to ensure a smooth flow of data and information.
 



  





 We're looking to hire a Lead C++ Software Engineer to join our Xware team. Xware’s secure and interoperable messaging solution xTrade, is designed to link organisations to their suppliers and partners, allowing them to safely share information. This software plays a key link in our world leading solution – connecting the supply chain.
 



  





**Requirements** 




 - 7+ years of experience in C++ back end programming for large scale systems
 



 - Experience leading a product team
 



 - Experience in data communications, security protocols and distributed systems
 



 - Knowledge of SQL is a plus
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




 - Lead your teams overall delivery, ensuring high quality of design, development and testing of new features
 



 - Working closely with product and other cross functional teams on the planning, prioritization, and execution of projects
 



 - Mentor engineers on your team, fostering a culture of continuous learning and growth
 



 - Tackle technical challenges, helping the team remove challenges that block progress
 



 - Documentation work, both content for end users and internal documentation.
 



  





**Benefits** 




 Our people are the foundations of our business and we value the contribution and commitment they make. We have a range of benefits including generous leave, flexible working, development opportunities, employee assistance programs, and more. Offering a flexible hybrid model of work, with our office located in Stockholm.
 



  





**About WiseTech Global** 




 At WiseTech Global we build leading technology solutions that help the logistics industry move goods globally. Our customers include the world’s largest logistics companies like FedEx and DHL.
 



 Our innovations and global technology enables, improves and empowers the world’s supply chains. Having listed on the ASX in 2016, WiseTech Global is now an ASX 50, AU$25 billion+ company that is serious about expansion and technical innovation. Our mission is to change the world by creating breakthrough products that empower those that own, enable, and operate the supply chains of the world.
 



  





**Before you Apply** 




*From time to time, WiseTech Global may use an external service provider to assess applications on our behalf. Accordingly, by applying for this role and providing your personal information to WiseTech Global, you consent to WiseTech Global providing this information to our external service providers who are required to treat such information with strict confidentiality in line with privacy and data protection laws and regulations.*

title: Battery Developer within electrical power supply, 24V battery
description:
Are you experienced or eager to learn about automotive chemistry? Do you want to play a central role in distributing 24V power across an entire vehicle? If so, this is the opportunity for you! We have several exciting low-voltage battery projects (up to 60V) in our roadmap, and we are looking for a passionate engineer to drive innovation in this field.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 As a battery developer engineer you will work close with a local group of experienced engineers and also in a team dedicated to battery development spread worldwide. You will develop, specify and test our VCA batteries, aiming at world class power supply for prototype and production ready heavy trucks and busses. You will work together with purchase, production and colleagues in development teams, incorporating different disciplines. One big part of your work will be to come up with test ideas for the batteries and the components that the group owns to ensure that they were simulated in different environment and usage conditions.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Develop, specify, and test our VCA batteries, ensuring world-class power supply solutions for prototypes and production-ready vehicles.
* Collaborate with purchase, production, and development teams, integrating expertise from multiple disciplines.
* Contribute to the advancement of 24V power supply systems, ensuring reliability, efficiency, and performance.
* We are in a transformation journey towards a team based, value flow way of working. You will participate actively in planning and daily work, striving for shortening lead times with quality and quantity kept at a high level.


**Who You Are**
 You have a M.Sc. or B.Sc. in Chemical, Physics, Materials, Electro, or Mechanical Engineering. You are either an experienced engineer or have some experience in battery development or related fields, with additional experience in purchase, production, or laboratory testing being a plus but not required.
   

  

 You are passionate about chemistry and development, are eager to learn and thrive in a collaborative environment with colleagues from around the world. You have strong organizational and prioritization skills, can handle multiple tasks simultaneously and are curious and proactive in solving challenges and thinking about possible different tests that can be done to ensure that the battery is proven in different environments and conditions.
   

  

 A passenger car driver’s license is required, and we will support you in obtaining one for heavy vehicles.
   

  

**This is us**
 We are a forward-thinking team dedicated to innovation and excellence in 24V battery systems and power supply solutions. We are passionate about creating high-quality products that meet our customers' needs while fostering a collaborative and positive work environment.
   

  

 Our team operates across all areas of 24V power supply for commercial vehicles, including ECU development, Battery engineering, Central electric units & power relays, Power architecture & function development and System testing & validation.
   

  

 We believe in open communication and teamwork, involving colleagues in our work to continuously improve and develop cutting-edge solutions.
   

  

 We offer We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-02-17. Selection and interviews will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests will be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
   

  

 Agnaldo Carvalho Barberino Junior, Group Manager, agnaldo.junior@scania.com
   

  

 We warmly welcome your application!

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
**Work Schedule**


Standard (Mon-Fri)**Environmental Conditions**


Office**Job Description**

*Do you have a passion for innovative ideas and groundbreaking discoveries? With over $1 billion invested annually in R&D, at Thermo Fisher Scientific you’ll help address some of the world’s toughest challenges, from giving cancer patients hope, ensuring safe drinking water and helping law enforcement tackle cases through forensics. We empower our teams to put science into meaningful action and give our R&D colleagues the autonomy, resources and tools they need to take science a step beyond.*

**Location Specific Information**


This position is based in Uppsala, where Thermo Fisher develops, manufactures, and markets complete blood test systems to support the clinical diagnosis and monitoring of allergy, asthma and autoimmune diseases. With 1,900 employees worldwide, and 1,000 in Sweden, we are the global leader in in-vitro allergy testing and the European leader in autoimmunity diagnostics.


See how our R&D professionals in Sweden are enjoying our innovative work atmosphere and the role they are playing in helping humankind: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AW6AYxC4l10

**Discover Impactful Work**


Are you looking for a meaningful job at an international company with strong values? Would you like to use your knowledge as a senior software developer and provide products enabling diagnosis of allergies and autoimmune diseases to customers around the world?


If you’re passionate about providing high quality software products, we encourage you to apply. We are strengthening our software development team within product development, and you will play an important role in providing software products for our diagnostic devices. We can offer you an exciting and rewarding career where you will get an excellent opportunity to develop your technical and professional skills in one of the world's largest life science companies.

**A day in Life with us**


You will work with design and development of software with focus on the application software for controlling our Phadia Instruments. The software team is responsible for several desktop and web-based software products, which are used for running Phadia Laboratory Systems and for the world-wide support of instruments. You will, for example:

* Development of specifications based on customer requirements
* Design, implement and test software
* Drive database implementation and maintenance work, throughout the product life cycle
* Participate in integration and verification work
* Participate in design reviews
* Participate in and drive new ways of working, including introducing new technologies
* Working with risk management and handling of complaints in accordance with our quality management system
* Writing and updating product documentation
* Participate in product maintenance and 3rd line support for our customers worldwide

**Keys to Success**


To succeed in this role, you are agile, resilient, and take ownership for your development. You never compromise on quality and always act responsibly remembering that our customers always come first. You speak and write excellent English.


We operate in a heavily regulated industry, so it is important that you have a structured way of working and documenting your work in line with the quality system. You are a great teammate who finds it easy to collaborate and communicate with others, and you are comfortable in leading and motivating your team members.


Thermo Fisher Scientific is a global company, so it is important that you enjoy working in an international and changing work environment, in a team that wants to have fun at work helping each other to create great products.

**Education**

* Preferred education level: Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related fields. Graduate degree is desirable.

**Experience**

* At least 6 years of work experience preferred as a software developer or equivalent role.
* Proficient in MS Windows desktop application development using MVVM, C#, .NET, WPF, SQL Server.
* Strong understanding of the software development lifecycle.
* Experience with Agile and DevOps methodologies and CI/CD pipelines.
* Experience from either software, hardware or system testing in a regulated environment.
* Experience from Windows security, application security, SDLC, DevSecOps or similar.
* Familiarity with medical/in-vitro-diagnostic equipment, associated software and common deployment models.

**Work Environment**


You will work from our office in Uppsala, Sweden with possibility for remote work in line with our policies.

**Benefits**


Thermo Fisher Scientific offers employment with an innovative, forward-thinking organization, and outstanding career and development prospects. We offer an exciting company culture that stands for integrity, intensity, involvement, and innovation! We believe it is not only the salary that matters when you decide to take up employment with us. We also offer a range of attractive benefits, together with a meaningful purpose and an exciting working environment where you can truly develop your potential. We offer competitive remuneration, annual incentive plan bonus, healthcare, and a range of employee benefits such as health benefits, flexible working hours, and a bonus scheme for all employees.


Apply today http://jobs.thermofisher.com
company_description: At Thermo Fisher Scientific, our professionals develop critical solutions—and build rewarding careers.

title: Frontend Utvecklare
description:

Vår familjära kultur, kombinerat med en hög expertisnivå, skapar en unik arbetsmiljö.
   

  

**Detta Erbjuder Vi Dig**
* Generösa förmåner, inklusive tjänstepension och bonusmöjligheter
* Kompetensutveckling
* Engagerande konferenser, teamaktiviteter, after works och hälsoinitiativ


 Som en del av vårt team kommer du arbeta nära både kollegor och våra värdefulla kunder. I rollen som utvecklare hos oss kommer du att ta dig an en spännande mix av uppgifter inom förvaltning, vidareutveckling och nyutveckling av datalager för en rad olika kunder. Denna mångfald skapar en dynamisk och varierande arbetsdag som ständigt erbjuder nya utmaningar.
   

  

**Din Profil**
* Minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Frontend utveckling
* Gedigen erfarenhet av JavaScript och ES6+.
* Erfarenhet av minst ett modernt ramverk/bibliotek: React eller Angular.
* God förståelse för HTML5, CSS3, och prestandaoptimering för webbläsare.
* Kunskap om responsiv design och erfarenhet av CSS-ramverk, såsom Bootstrap.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med API:er (REST och/eller GraphQL).
* Erfarenhet av versionhanteringssystem som Git.
* Relevant ingenjörsexamen/yrkesutbildning inom IT eller datateknik
* Behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av TypeScript.
* Erfarenhet av state management-bibliotek som Redux, MobX eller Pinia.
* Förståelse för UX/UI-design och erfarenhet av samarbete med designers (Figma, Adobe XD).
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines och DevOps-relaterade verktyg.
* Kunskap om prestandamätning och optimering av frontend-applikationer
* Erfarenhet av server-side rendering (SSR) eller statisk generering (Next.js, Nuxt).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta agilt (Scrum/Kanban).
* Erfarenhet av byggverktyg som Webpack, Vite eller Parcel.
* Kunskap om testning, med verktyg som Jest, Cypress eller liknande.
* Tidigare konsulterfarenhet


 Som individ värdesätter vi din förmåga att kommunicera, din ambition och ditt engagemang. Ditt självständiga driv och din flexibilitet gör dig till en ovärderlig del av vårt team.
   

  

**Vi är Nion**
 På Nion kombinerar vi teknisk spetskompetens med ett starkt engagemang för att hjälpa våra kunder nå framgång. Vi är stolta över att vara en flexibel partner på den digitala resan, där vi erbjuder både individuella specialister som förstärker kundens team och kompletta, välkoordinerade utvecklingsteam från våra interna enheter. Våra lösningar sträcker sig från avancerad affärsautomation och AI till skräddarsydd systemutveckling, stabil drift och support samt dataarkitektur och analys som omvandlar data till insiktsfulla beslut.
   

  

 Med över 250 skickliga konsulter och kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Oslo, Skopje och Bitola, har vi hjälpt företag världen över att växa genom innovation, samarbete och ett passionerat fokus på resultat. Våra kärnvärden –
 **samarbete** 
 ,
 **engagemang** 
 och
 **innovation** 
 – driver oss att ständigt leverera lösningar som gör skillnad, både för våra kunder och för våra medarbetare.
   

  

 Redo för nästa äventyr? Skicka in din ansökan idag!

title: Senior Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Utveckling, felsökning och underhåll.
* Ge stöd kring incidenter kring hämtnings- och laddningsflöden.
* Datamodellering och integration av nya datakällor.
* Justeringar av befintlig datamodell.
* Stöd och utveckling av nyckeltal och rapporter i Power BI.
* Sätta upp flöden för inläsning av filer.
* Stöd kring konvertering från äldre miljö (MSSQL och QlikView).
* Programmering inom Python, XML och Json.
* Utbildning av både administratörer och utvecklare i dataplattformen


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Erfarenhet från att hantera dataskyddsförordningen (GDPR)
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av arbete inom Hälso- och sjukvårdssektorn.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av Power BI.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av SQL Server Analysis Services
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av erfarenhet av Azure Data Factory
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av erfarenhet av T-SQL och MS SQL Server
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av erfarenhet av Azure Devops och GIT inklusive Python
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av XML
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av JSON


**Meriterande**
* Kunskap om hybridarkitektur för dataplattformar i Microsoft miljö.
* Erfarenhet av utbildning inom Business Intelligence av både administratörer och utvecklare i dataplattformen.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 17-02-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Integrationsarkitekt - sökes till Accelerate at Iver i Stockholm
description:
*Nu letar vi efter nya medarbetare som vill vara med på vår resa. Som en del av Accelerate at Iver ligger du i teknikens absoluta framkant och arbetar med spännande digitaliserings- och transformationsprojekt hos marknadsledande kunder. Vi är idag över 300 konsulter som brinner för att realisera digitala möjligheter i molnet. Tillsammans med våra kunder stänger vi gapet mellan aspiration och framgångsrik implementation.
 **Nu söker vi en Integrationsarkitekt som vill bli en del av Accelerate at Iver och som vill vara med och bidra till bättre IT-lösningar som gör skillnad för våra kunder! Är du vår nya kollega?***
**Din roll på Accelerate at Iver?**
 Som integrationsarkitekt hos Accelerate at Iver kommer du att bidra till att bygga robusta, moderna och långsiktiga integrationslösningar. Lösningarna byggs främst på Microsoft-teknologi utifrån hybrida moln, dvs on-prem och cloud. I din roll kommer du att kombinera Ivers paketerade tjänster med skräddarsydda kundunika lösningar som byggs av våra spetskonsulter inom integrationsområdet.
   

  

**Några Exempel På Arbetsuppgifter Kan Vara**
* Ta fram lösningsförslag utifrån Accelerate at Ivers eller våra kunders arkitektur-principer i kombination med verksamhetsmässiga mål. Dokumentera lösningsförslagen åt utvecklare och andra projektdeltagare
* Samarbeta i olika delar av projektfaser med kravställning, utvecklare, testare, beställare och produktägare
* Samarbeta med andra lösningsarkitekter och it-arkitekter för att gemensamt ta fram bra och kostnadseffektiva lösningar
* Ta fram konceptuella design-förslag som inledande initiativ
* Identifiera och implementera kvalitetsförbättringar i befintliga lösningar, såsom skalbarhet, säkerhet, återanvändbarhet m.m.
* Agera brygga mellan verksamhet och IT, kommunicera och argumentera för bra lösningar
* Assistera i det löpande utvecklings- och förvaltningsarbetet kring integrationslösningar
* Balansera kort- och långsiktiga mål i ditt arbetssätt


**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
 Accelerate at Iver kan erbjuda dig ett utmanande och varierande jobb som konsult med stora personliga utvecklingsmöjligheter! Vi satsar hårt på kompetensutveckling och att ständigt hålla oss i teknisk framkant.
   

  

 Hos Accelerate at Iver får du utvecklas tillsammans med duktiga och erfarna kollegor som har arbetat med C#, .Net Core och Microservices i flera stora och utmanade projekt de senaste åren. Våra kunder är nationella och globala både medel och stora bolag.
   

  

 Vi har intressanta, långsiktiga uppdrag och team-leveranser där du kan utvecklas och arbeta nära kollegor som delar din passion för teknik.
   

  

 Som anställd på Accelerate at Iver får du ett antal fördelar som:
   

  

* En trygg och säker anställning
* Individuellt anpassad utvecklings- och utbildningsplan
* Friskvårdsbidrag
* Hälso & sjukvårdsförsäkring
* Pensions och försäkringsrådgivning
* Förmånsportal
* Timbank & volontärdag
* Medarbetar och familjeaktiviteter i olika former


**Vem söker vi?**
 Du bör ha färdigheter inom alla eller vissa av dessa områden:
   

  

* C#, .NET Core och .NET Framework
* RESTful services, Microservices, Azure Logic Apps, Azure Function Apps, App Services, Azure API Apps
* SQL Server, Azure SQL, Entity Framework, Azure Storage, Azure Data Factory
* Azure Service Bus, Azure Event Grid, Azure API Management, Azure Active Directory
* Microsoft Visual Studio/Visual Studio Code, Post man, Git, Azure DevOps, Gitflow, SoapUI
* PowerShell, Bash


 Du bör ha jobbat minst 3-5 år i utvecklingsteam med utveckling inom ovanstående områden.
   

  

 Du bör ha jobbat i agila team med scrum- eller kanban som arbetssätt, och vara van vid de olika rollerna och rollfördelningen som ett sådant arbetssätt innebär.
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen som konsult bör du ha lätt att skapa relationer, kunna arbeta både i team och självständigt och ha stor personlig drivkraft och lösningsfokus.
   

  

 Är du en social, flexibel och strukturerad person med stort intresse inom av arbeta med och att utvecklas inom de senaste teknologierna så tror vi du kommer passa in och trivas utmärkt hos oss!
   

  

 För denna position krävs Svenskt medborgarskap, vi utför även bakgrundskontroll av slutkandidat.
   

  

**Placeringsort**
 Iver finns på 25 platser i Sverige & Norge. För denna roll ser vi att du utgår från ett av våra kontor i Stockholm.
   

  

**Sök till oss!**
 Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Accelerate at Iver eftersträvar en jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald. Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Du är välkommen att kontakta Magida Musa (magida.musa@iver.se) vid frågor eller funderingar kring tjänsten. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Välkommen till Accelerate at Iver!
   

  

**We empower our Nordic society** 
 . Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation.
   

  

**Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder – utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort.** 
 Vi säkerställer att sjukvården har tillgång till rätt patientdata, att samhällskritiska system aldrig ligger nere och att flygplanen landar säkert. Som en lyhörd och affärsnära helhetspartner möjliggör vi våra kunders innovation – idag och imorgon.
